name: code-logger
description: Code-Logger: Monitor and manage application activity effortlessly through detailed logs. Keep a watchful eye on your codebase by tracking errors, events, and key interactions, empowering you to maintain a smooth and reliable web experience.

scripts.un-compress:microbundle: microbundle -o example/web/logger.min.js --external none --format umd --sourcemap true --compress false watch
scripts.build: rm -rf ./lib && microbundle --format modern,esm,cjs && microbundle -o lib/logger.min.js --format umd --sourcemap true && cp -rf lib example
scripts.build:un-compress: rm -rf ./lib && microbundle --format modern,esm,cjs && microbundle -o lib/logger.min.js --format umd --sourcemap true --compress false && cp -rf lib example
scripts.version: npm run format && git add -A src

author: code-crash
